content: * you can find the free knit pattern here 1 - https //cozynooksdesigns com/triplecordcardi * you can find the lion brand yarn kit here 2 - https //lionbrand sjv io/vpry6o it is also a full video tutorial you can find here 3 the triple cord cardi is a beginner-friendly top-down cardigan with no seaming making it an easy and enjoyable project it features 3 icord removable closures allowing for a customizable cardigan - wear it open all the way closed or somewhere in between a full video tutorial along with additional helpful videos ensures a smooth knitting experience for all skill levels ​ sizes xs s m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x considered beginner level there is a full video tutorial pattern includes - instant download pdf file us knit terminology schematic circumference length width and sleeve lengths for 9 sizes tech-edited pattern gauge video level - beginner+ materials - weight 3 yarn - 890 1015 1085 1221 1345 1485 1630 1740 1825 yds/ 4 5 5 6 6 7 8 8 8 balls of lion brand yarn wool-ease dk yarn olive us 6/4 0 mm knitting needles 40 circular us 4/3 5 mm knitting needles 40 circular us 4/3 5 mm knitting needles double pointed needles stitch markers scissors tapestry needle you can purchase the lion brand yarn kit pattern and yarn colors of you choice here - https //lionbrand sjv io/vpry6o 4 *** if you buy 2 patterns - use code 2patterns for 10% off if you buy 3 patterns - use code 3patterns for 15% off if you buy 4 patterns - use code 4patterns for 20% off *** patterns due to the electronic nature of my patterns i cannot offer refunds 1 https //cozynooksdesigns com/triplecordcardi 2 https //lionbrand sjv io/vpry6o 3 https //www youtube com/cozynooksdesigns sub_confirmation=1 4 https //lionbrand sjv io/vpry6o
